Nana Adwoa Awindor bụ onye Ghana na-ahụ maka ihe onyonyo na Development Queenmother nke Afigya-Kwabre district na mpaghara Ashanti nke Ghana.  N'afọ 2013, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche mbụ nke Continental Executive Board nke African Queens and Women Cultural Leaders Network Ọ bụ onye otu Ghana National Union of Queenmothers (Women Traditional Leaders).

NanaHemaa Awindor bụ onye na-ahụ maka nakwa onye na-akwado ihe ngosi telivishọn nke First Ghanaian International Link Greetings From Abroad / Back Home Again, na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe, Premier Productions.
Awindor bụ onye Adum Kwanwoma. Ọ bụ nne onye na-agụ egwu Efya.
A kpọrọ Awindor CIMG Marketing Woman of the Year (2006).
